name: LVL. 0
description:
LVL. 0 is a game where you have to fight the same boss over and over. However, each time you "level down". The goal of the game is to reach and defeat the boss at level 0.

This game was made for the BTPJam3. I used LMMS to create the music, BFXR to create the sounds, and GMS2 as my engine.
